.table foo
bar{a: A, b: B} :-
  foo{a: A, b: B} & A != B.
----
application/graphviz
digraph G {
  "foo" [fillcolor="darksalmon" fontname="Courier" label="foo:  []" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "0" [fillcolor="" fontname="Courier" label="0: Builtin(base.neq{a: A, b: B}) [A-B]" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "1" [fillcolor="darkseagreen2" fontname="Courier" label="1: Match(foo{a: A, b: B}; {}) [A-B]" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "2" [fillcolor="thistle" fontname="Courier" label="2: Join(A, B) []" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "bar" [fillcolor="lightblue" fontname="Courier" label="bar: Subst({a: A, b: B}) []" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "foo" -> "1" [];
  "0" -> "2" [];
  "1" -> "2" [];
  "2" -> "bar" [];
}

.table parents
sibling{left: L, right: R} :-
  parents{child: L, mother: M, father: F} &
  parents{child: R, mother: M, father: F} &
  L != R.
----
application/graphviz
digraph G {
  "parents" [fillcolor="darksalmon" fontname="Courier" label="parents:  []" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "0" [fillcolor="" fontname="Courier" label="0: Builtin(base.neq{a: L, b: R}) [R]" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "1" [fillcolor="darkseagreen2" fontname="Courier" label="1: Match(parents{child: R, father: F, mother: M}; {}) [M-F]" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "2" [fillcolor="darkseagreen2" fontname="Courier" label="2: Match(parents{child: L, father: F, mother: M}; {}) [M-F]" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "3" [fillcolor="thistle" fontname="Courier" label="3: Join(M, F) [R]" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "4" [fillcolor="thistle" fontname="Courier" label="4: Join(R) []" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "sibling" [fillcolor="lightblue" fontname="Courier" label="sibling: Subst({left: L, right: R}) []" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "parents" -> "1" [];
  "parents" -> "2" [];
  "1" -> "3" [];
  "2" -> "3" [];
  "0" -> "4" [];
  "3" -> "4" [];
  "4" -> "sibling" [];
}

.table input.char
.table input.next
main{span: span{from: P1, to: P2}} :-
  input.char{id: P1, char: C} &
  input.next{left: P1, right: P2} &
  base.lte{a: "a", b: C} &
  base.lte{a: C, b: "z"}.
----
application/graphviz
digraph G {
  "0" [fillcolor="" fontname="Courier" label="0: Builtin(base.lte{a: C, b: \"z\"}) [C]" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "1" [fillcolor="" fontname="Courier" label="1: Builtin(base.lte{a: \"a\", b: C}) [C]" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "2" [fillcolor="darkseagreen2" fontname="Courier" label="2: Match(input.char{char: C, id: P1}; {}) [P1]" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "3" [fillcolor="darkseagreen2" fontname="Courier" label="3: Match(input.next{left: P1, right: P2}; {}) [P1]" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "4" [fillcolor="thistle" fontname="Courier" label="4: Join(P1) [C]" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "5" [fillcolor="thistle" fontname="Courier" label="5: Join(C) [C]" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "6" [fillcolor="thistle" fontname="Courier" label="6: Join(C) []" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "input.next" [fillcolor="darksalmon" fontname="Courier" label="input.next:  []" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "main" [fillcolor="lightblue" fontname="Courier" label="main: Subst({span: span{from: P1, to: P2}}) []" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "input.char" [fillcolor="darksalmon" fontname="Courier" label="input.char:  []" shape="box" style="filled"];
  "0" -> "6" [];
  "1" -> "5" [];
  "2" -> "4" [];
  "3" -> "4" [];
  "4" -> "5" [];
  "5" -> "6" [];
  "6" -> "main" [];
  "input.next" -> "3" [];
  "input.char" -> "2" [];
}
